author: Krassimir Kossev
releaseNotes:
2.6.6 2023-10-03 - REVERTED BACK TO VERSION 2.6.6 timeStamp 2023/05/30 1:51 PM
2.6.6 2023-05-30 - reverseButton default value bug fix;
2.6.5 2023-05-15 - TS0215A _TZ3000_pkfazisv iAlarm (Meian) SOS button fingerprint correction; number of buttons and supportedValues correction for SOS buttons; added _TZ3000_abrsvsou
2.6.4 2023-04-27 - added Sonoff SNZB-01; added IKEA Tradfri Shortcut Button E1812; added AC0251600NJ/AC0251100NJ OSRAM Lightify Switch Mini; added TS0041 _TZ3000_fa9mlvja 1 button; TS0215A _TZ3000_2izubafb inClusters correction
2.6.3 2023-03-11 - added TS0215 _TYZB01_qm6djpta _TZ3000_fsiepnrh _TZ3000_p6ju8myv; added state.stats{rxCtr,txCtr,rejoinCtr}; added Advanced options; added batteryReportingOptions; battery reporting is not changed by default!
2.6.2 2023-02-23 - added Konke button model: 3AFE280100510001 ; LoraTap _TZ3000_iszegwpd TS0046 buttons 5&6; 
2.6.1 2023-02-05 - added _TZ3000_mh9px7cq; isSmartKnob() typo fix; added capability 'Health Check'; added powerSource attribute 'battery'; added dummy ping() code;
2.6.0 2023-01-28 - added healthStatus; Initialize button is disabled;
2.5.2 2023-01-28 - _TZ3000_vp6clf9d (TS0044) debouncing; added Loratap TS0046 (6 buttons);
2.5.1 2023-01-20 - battery percentage remaining HomeKit compatibility
2.5.0 2023-01-14 - bug fix: battery percentage remaining automatic reporting was not configured, now hardcoded to 8 hours; bug fix: 'released'event; debug info improvements; declared supportedButtonValues attribute
2.4.7 2022-12-22 - added TS004F _TZ3000_rco1yzb1 LIDL Smart Button SSBM A1; added _TZ3000_u3nv1jwk
2.4.6 2022-11-20- added TS004F _TZ3000_ja5osu5g - 1 button!; isTuya() bug fix
2.4.5 2022-10-27 - added icasa ICZB-KPD18S 8 button controller.
2.4.4 2022-10-22 - _TZ3000_vp6clf9d fingerprint correction; importURL changed to dev. branch; added _TZ3000_w8jwkczz and other TS0041, TS0042, TS0043, TS004 fingerprints
2.4.3 2022-09-18 - added TS0042 Tuya Zigbee 2 Gang Wireless Smart Switch; removed 'release' event for TS0044 switches (not supported by hardware); 'release' digital event bug fix.
2.4.2 2022-05-07 - added LoraTap 6 button Scene Controller; device.getDataValue bug fix;
2.4.1 2022-04-23 - improved tracing of debounce logic code; option [overwrite: true] is set explicitely on debouncing timer restart; debounce timer increased to 1000ms
2.4.0 2022-03-31 - added support for 'MOES remote TS0044', singleThreaded: true; bug fix: debouncing timer was not started for TS0044 remote
2.3.0 2022-02-13 - added support for 'Tuya Smart Knob TS004F'
2.2.4 2021-12-05 - added support for 'YSR-MINI-Z Remote TS004F'
